description: First differences of sequence of consecutive safe primes.
example: Except for (5,7) and (7,11), all terms are divisible by 12, since safe primes are congruent to 5 modulo 6 except 7 and safe_prime+6 is not a safe prime. Closest safe primes differ by 12 like (11,23) or (83207,83219).
author: _Labos Elemer_, Jan 26 2001
extensions: Fixed cross reference in formula [Harvey P. Dale, Jan. 12, 2011]
